stacks.description: Deploy stacks matching the given ids. Required when more than one stack is present in the app.

outputsFile.description: Path to file where stack outputs will be written as JSON, relative to cdktf.json.

outputsFileIncludeSensitiveOutputs.description: Whether to include sensitive outputs in the output file.

ignoreMissingStackDependencies.description: Don't check if all stacks specified in the command have their dependencies included as well.

parallelism.description: Number of concurrent CDKTF stacks to run. Defaults to infinity, denoted by -1.
